column4: if you set "VERBOSE=yes" in /etc/default/rcS , your boot screen will stay in text mode
Is there any way to fix the graphic... it's not mission critical but a nice asthetic.
I have this problem with edgy amd64, but the parallel edgy i386 installation is okay. I'm thinking about filing a bug
You should! I filed a bug about my audio not working. It's important, I think, for the dev's to know what's up.
